caption: The food was: Fresh &  Flavorful! Since my adult son and I decided to have family style lunch, I ordered the triple tacos, spicy burrito... (Hot) but yummy and the club sandwich.  Everything is really good! The owner was very personable, I will definitely visit again!
Great food, great host!
Absolutely amazing food and service! Will come back for sure!
My first time,and it won't be my last.Food and service was excellent!!!

My husband, my 4 year old toddler and I ate here for lunch today, and we were excited we chose Zest. This place does raw vegan right.🥳 The food was amazing. The flavours were on point. The food presentation was an experience in and of itself. We were quite pleased with the amount of food we received. We’re definitely coming back!

My friends and I really enjoy Chef Mehmet's fresh food! It's truly a unique experience every time! I try to order different things each time and every item on the menu has been delicious and filling. The chef's creativity and commitment to raw cuisine really translates to very scrumptious, nutritious dishes! Each time I visit,  I am inspired to eat healthier and to keep adding raw food to my daily diet, and that is an added benefit. I have dined in Mehmet's former restaurant years ago and hope that he will continue to serve his community with healthy eats. I also appreciate how friendly and a great host he has proven to be! We just learned he will be giving his raw food secrets away on YouTube as he has launched a new channel. Be sure to check it out!

I am thoroughly pleased with the food by Chef Mehmet!  I’ve had the pleasure of trying his food for about 14 years now and I am hooked!  The food is DELICIOUS, and the portions are nice/affordable. Mehmet is a great host-very friendly & welcoming. I recommend checking out zestrawveganeats.com.

I ordered a pizza and Mediterranean falafel bowel. This was outstanding and very filling. I was extremely satisfied. The owner was a very good conversationalist which is always important to me. It makes me feel as family. Highly recommend it! Come support this outstanding business!

I had takeout delivered from Zest for the first time yesterday and the food is heavenly good! I've been looking for a place that cares about organic ingredients and there is no doubt they are intentional about using fresh, high-quality produce. The flavors are beyond delicious and the prices are affordable. Thank you, Zest. I felt the love and passion poured into your food.
Beautiful food with complex and rich flavors, well-made with care. Mehmet and his crew are awesome!

My husband and I visited today, and it was a delightful experience! We ordered the living pizza, pumpkin soup, falafel wrap, kebab platter, mango cheese cake, helva and the lavender kombucha. The winner was the living pizza!  The place is clean as a a whistle and the hospitality was matchless! Something you don't usually find in raw restaurants. The chef was very graceful and had a pleasant conversation with us.  The only teeny tiny thing I wasn't happy about is that there was steam coming out of my soup.  Which doesn't tell me it's "raw." Also, the patties and rice pilaf on the kebab platter had burnt sides. The broccoli, beet and carrot on the kebab stick were extremely soft, and tasted steamed. In any case, I trust that the chef tried to keep the temperature below 118 degrees while nuking all that up, since most of the stuff we ordered was pre-made. Albeit, everything was very tasty!

Just got this criminally-underpriced falafel sandwich (I’m a tall guy and it dwarfs my hands) made to order, and it was delicious and insanely filling. Chef Mehmet had a smile on their face instantly when I walked through the door. I ordered online, and when the order didn’t come through right away on one of their app services, they gave me some complimentary tea for the wait. You really don’t get fresh ingredients and this level of care and craftsmanship at this price anywhere in the city. Support this place!

Went to Zest and had a wonderful experience. The food was delicious and prepared to order. The service can be a little slow so it is better to order ahead. The chef/owner is very committed to making high quality tasty healthy vegan food. Definitely recommend and will be returning soon!
The best food I've ever eaten in my entire life.
Love it ❤

Exceptional! I don’t follow a vegan diet, but was looking for something healthy and fresh and was really pleased to find ZEST. The soup, salad, and sandwich were well portioned and the flavors were all unique and delicious. The chef apologized it took a little longer to prepare because he said he cuts everything fresh to order - absolutely worth the wait. Highly recommend!
I accidentally found the best vegan restaurant in Chicago. Try their herbal tea.

I ordered an open enchilada for to go and it was so so good! Seriously amazing taste, and very fresh and made to order. I loved the cashew sauce on the enchilada and their own bean sauce as well! Very fresh, light and tasty. The prices are very reasonable too, and a bit cheaper than at RAW (which I like too but they are further from my home). And the owner is quite friendly. A nice addition to the neighborhood!

Best raw vegan food in the world I can say that because I been trying many years to  convert my self to eat more vegan plant based living food just founded in Chicago.  Fast fresh and organic juices smoothies great salads sandwiches and protein bowls and signature dishes I have tried to many of the item in the menu loved them.all. Chef is great looks like family business.  Friendly place I highly recommended.
I Almost eat at this place everyday love the food and friendly staff. Price is very reasonable and generous portions plus free tea evreytime.
First of all, the digs of this place are perfect! Every dish is made with TLC so don't expect a fast, quick McDs type meal. Now to the flavor...
This is the best raw food vegan place in town! King of the fruit (durian) smoothie is the best. Soo dreamy creamy addicting. We also got the kebab platter and it was very tasty. Yummy eats.
Got a mango salad from here. It was a little bit too spicy, but really tasty.
Really nice place. Food is really good and service is the best. Can’t wait to go back again 😍
Incredible food. Owner was so sweet and gave great recommendations ❤️
Great experience overall, amazing food, superb service.

What a great new spot - so happy to have Zest in the neighborhood! We had the mini mushrooms, Thai spinach salad, falafel wrap, tamales & enchiladas verde - all very flavorful and delicious.  Enchiladas verde really blew me away!  It was fun to see what the vegan-rendition would be on some of these classic menu items. All fresh ingredients - you can tell the staff takes care of the food they prepare. Would highly recommend Zest, even if you're unfamiliar with vegan cuisine. The chef even threw in a free dessert - carrot cheesecake - the perfect end to a great meal!

Such a great spot!  Really healthy, and great tasting food! You can tell they really care about the quality and presentation! Vegan food with a Turkish flare. I've been looking for a healthy option (especially during this pandemic, where I've been creeping up on the Covid-15). Highly recommend!!!

WOWOWWW this food is beyond delicious! i got the enchilada verde and was BLOWN away by the flavor, freshness, and taste from this delicious meal.  as a fellow raw vegan, this was hands down the best raw vegan food i’ve had at a restaurant. my boyfriend got the falafel wrap and it was a home rub, 10/10.  aside from the tasty food, the people working there were extremely kind and welcoming.  i’ll be coming back here again and recommend it to anyone. 🤤😋☺️

Personally, I feel better after eating a raw vegan dish, but I am also aware that my body craves warm soups and a cheeky pizza from time to time. I encourage everyone to try it at least once, I know vegan food can be scary, and I can only image what raw veganism sounds like! But trust me on this one. I promise that you won't regret it! Not to mention the obvious health and nutritional benefits of adding more raw plant-based meals to our diets. As with all vegans choosing raw vegan is compassionate, and therefore deserves our thoughtful consideration. Choosing raw doesn't mean depriving our tastebuds either. Zest Raw Vegan Eats is situated in Lincoln Park. Chef Mehmak Ak specializes in organic living foods and wholefoods. Stop in and enjoy everything from their Meze and smoothie's, to fresh juices and Kombucha teas, to their awesome coffee. You can top it off with his specialized guilt-free unbaked raw desserts. At Zest Raw Vegan Eats, you can actually have your cake and eat it (and come back for another raw meal) too!
Bless my soul man! Good fooooooood! Tryna come here like everyday. I tried the falafel wrap and it was so delicious. The people inside are super nice and joyful. You should try it!

I was here visiting from Michigan and I knew I’d find good vegan food, but I was pleasantly surprised by the meal I received from Zest! Wow! Thank you for being so creative and on purpose with food! My body thanks you tonight💚
Mamet (Owner) , very personable and great service. Food is amazing. I will be back to visit whenever I come to Chicago. Definitely an experience!

This is my new FAVORITE vegan restaurant. The prices for the raw food is SUCH a great deal. $8 for a sandwich where other places are usually $14. The salad is sooooo good I've never tasted such good dressing like it. The service is so friendly, kind, and genuinely care. When I asked for suggestions they didn't tell me to get most expensive item, but based their suggestions on my needs. You HAVE TO GO HERE. It'll make you so happy
Excellent raw vegan food.  I would highly recommend.
Had the Vegan Kimchee and was delighted at the burst of flavor.  I'm not vegan but I would eat this dish every week.   Highly recommend.  Will be back to try more.
Amazing raw vegan dishes and some of the best in the city hands down.  Raw food  here comes some of the best raw dishes I think Chicago will ever taste.

I just had the tamale and OMG! This was absolutely amazing! The owner Mehmet Ak is such the conversationalist and he made our food right in front of us. The tamales made me feel energized and full at the same time but not the sleepy full!! He also gave us some herbal tea and I feel like it boosted my immune system! And he has alkaline water!! I absolutely love this place and the service and highly recommend this place. Clean food, positive energy -doesn’t get better than that!
Fresh! Best RAW & VEGAN Restaurant in Chicago.

This place is awesome. I discovered it on UberEats. Just reading through the menu I was very impressed. I’ve ordered 2 times so far and the quality of the food totally blew me away. This is the only google review I’ve written in years, that should tell you how good this place is. Highly recommend.
Best raw vegan food in chicago
